name: MinkasuMobileSDK
summary: MinkasuMobileSDK is the SDK for Minkasu app integrations.
description: Minkasu SDK for 3rd party app integrations with Minkasu Cross Platform Payment solutions.

xcconfig.OTHER_LDFLAGS: -ObjC -framework Accelerate -framework AudioToolbox -framework AVFoundation -framework CoreGraphics -framework CoreImage -framework CoreMedia -framework CoreText -framework CoreVideo -framework Foundation -framework MobileCoreServices -framework QuartzCore -framework Security -framework SystemConfiguration -framework UIKit -lc++ -liconv -lz
